title: Any champions like Azir or Zed?!
body: I'm looking to pick up someone new in around the top/ mid lanes or maybe jungle, someone who has a lot of outplay potential, can carry games looks really cool and possibly has a high skill ceiling. Any help is appreciated :)

replies.body:
lv28..

I highly suggest not picking a champion with a high skill ceiling. *Especially Azir*. He is brutally difficult and punishes mistakes, good azir players are very rare in lower elos.

There is a strange misconception that playing high-skill champions makes the player highly skilled, this is why you see so many yasuos, zeds ect feeding on spectacular levels.

Yea I was just wondering about champs that I could put a lot of time into learning but I understand your point, who might you recommend for me at the moment?

Anything you enjoy playing. There are no low-skill or easy champions, regardless of a lot of common misconceptions. Not having to struggle with punishing mechanics frees you up to work on teamwork, awareness and knowledge.

{{champion:82}}   Not flashy,simple mechanics but easiest champion to gank and you have low health scaling. You need to have  a good game knowledge if you don't want to feed more than the redcross. requires some attention during teamfights since the ghost is buggy sometimes(most bugged champion,so if you want some challenge,go for it because sometimes your spells won't do damages :p ). You can outplay the enemy if you have good knowledge of the damages you may take before dying since generating your shield is your core mechanic,that's the difference between 1 kill and 10hp left and dead.
